setting.atmosphere: Dense urban sprawl, neon-lit memory markets, sterile corporate memory vaults, underground black market operations
secondary_locations: The Vault - secure memory archive facility
The Undercity - black market memory trading district
Neural Research Institute - where memory transfer was invented

memory_transfer.copenhagen_protocol: No consciousness can exist in two places simultaneously - enforced by quantum physics
memory_transfer.quantum_signatures: Memory manipulation leaves detectable quantum signatures that forensic analysts can identify

technology_level.memory_digitization: Complete extraction and storage of human memories
technology_level.neural_implants: Standard for all citizens above poverty line
technology_level.consciousness_backup: Legal for citizens, available every 6 months
technology_level.physical_augmentation: Common but separate from memory enhancement

memory_class_system.Originals: Unmodified consciousness, highest social status, 15% of population
memory_class_system.Augmented: Enhanced with purchased skill memories, 60% of population
memory_class_system.Composites: Constructed from multiple donor memories, 20% of population
memory_class_system.Blanks: Memory-wiped individuals, criminal punishment or voluntary, 5% of population

social_structures.governance: Corporate council system - five mega-corps control memory infrastructure

economic_system.memory_as_currency: Skill memories tradeable, emotional memories priceless black market commodity

themes: Identity beyond memory - what makes us 'us' if memories can be changed
The price of immortality - consciousness backup promises eternal life but at what cost
Class warfare through cognitive inequality - those with better memories have better lives
tone: Noir thriller with philosophical undertones, fast-paced action with moments of existential contemplation, morally gray characters in impossible situations

trilogy_arc.book_1: Discovery and conspiracy - protagonist learns her memories are fabricated, uncovers government manipulation
trilogy_arc.book_2: War and betrayal - conflict between Originals and Augmented, protagonist discovers she's a Composite spy
trilogy_arc.book_3: Revolution and rebirth - fight over The Last Original Human child, sacrifice for authenticity over immortality
